message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Hi Bob, I understand that $90 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to compromise. I can meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $87. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $82?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $84. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $80?
